last_episode_to_air.name: CHAPTER FOUR - THE WAY OUT
last_episode_to_air.overview: Seeking to live a quiet life with his family away from police scrutiny, Veerappan plans his next steps — until a covert ruse finally seals his doom.

name: The Hunt for Veerappan
overview: This docuseries follows the rise and fall of Veerappan, a dreaded smuggler whose bloody reign sparked a 20-year-long manhunt in south India.

episodes.name: CHAPTER ONE - THE FOREST KING
episodes.overview: As Veerappan builds his criminal empire, a long-standing rivalry with police is ignited. A rift with a senior officer launches an extensive manhunt.

episodes.name: CHAPTER TWO - THE BLOODBATH
episodes.overview: Violence and bloodshed erupts across the forest and in villages as Veerappan retaliates against the police.

episodes.name: CHAPTER THREE - THE REVOLUTIONARY
episodes.overview: In a brazen move, Veerappan abducts movie star Dr. Rajkumar, stoking fury in Karnataka and sending politicians into chaos in two states.

episodes.name: CHAPTER FOUR - THE WAY OUT
episodes.overview: Seeking to live a quiet life with his family away from police scrutiny, Veerappan plans his next steps — until a covert ruse finally seals his doom.
